author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Slightly off-topic
body:
I noticed a Ben Stiller Japanese commercial at 
http://www.japander.com/japander/index.htm . Does the guy who saw the newest 
Lupin think this is the same commercial they showed in-between? If not, at 
least you can have a good laugh. :)
